teffcomp module:¶

Routines for looking at ASPCAP Teff vs other effective temperature estimates, e.g. photometric Teffs for different samples

holtz.apogee.teffcomp.bindata(xdata, ydata, bins)[source]¶

Given xdata, ydata, and bins in x, returns mean of ydata in each of the bins

holtz.apogee.teffcomp.ghb(allstar, glatmin=30.0, ebvmax=0.03, dwarf=False, trange=[4000, 5000], mhrange=[-2.5, 0.75])[source]¶

Compares allstar ASPCPAP Teff with photometric Teff from GHB for sample of stars with GLAT>glatmin and SFD_EBV<ebvmax, does fits

Parameters:

allstar – allStar structure
Keyword Arguments:
 
  • glatmin (float) – minimum GLAT for sample (default=30)
  • ebvmax (float) – maximum SFD_EBV for sample (default=0.03)
  • dwarf (bool) – use dwarfs and dwarf GHB (default = False)
holtz.apogee.teffcomp.irfm(allstar, trange=[4000, 5000], mhrange=[-2.5, 0.75])[source]¶

Compares allstar ASPCPAP Teff with various photometric Teff from JAJ compilation (SAGA, CL, TH, SFD) Does fits

Parameters:allstar – allStar structure
holtz.apogee.teffcomp.dr13dr12()[source]¶

compare dr13 dr12 Teff
